## Introduction

Over time, projects accumulate "Ghost Dependencies"â€”packages that are listed in DESCRIPTION but no longer used in the code.

## Workflow

To scan your project, simply point the scanner at your root directory:

```r
library(staticanalysis)

# Define your project path
my_project <- "path/to/my/project"

# Run the scan
report <- scan_dependencies(my_project)

# View Ghost Packages
print(report$undeclared_ghosts)
